name: Spongebob VS Garfield a death with a truth
name_original: Spongebob VS Garfield a death with a truth
description:
An Super Smash Brothers fangame that you can play with GARFIELD AND SPONGEBOB! but not like nickelodeon all star brawl, you fight with REAL GUNS!

-----------------THE HECKING CONTROLS -------------------------

spongebob - WASD = MOVE 
                             SHOOT = SPACE
garfield - ARROWS = MOVE
                               (.) = SHOOT

------------------AN QUICK NOTE----------------------------------------------

where do i start
